alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Essex; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 2:40AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow/sleet accumulations of a coating 1 inch south of the Massachusetts Turnpike. 1 to 3 inches of snow and sleet expected north of the Massachusetts Turnpike with the higher amounts most likely north of Route 2. Ice accumulations of a light glaze are also possible. * WHERE...Western, Central and interior Northeast Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions this afternoon and evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and sleet overspread the region between 9 am and 1 pm from southwest to northeast. Precipitation will change mainly to rain this evening with pockets of light freezing rain possible mainly in the higher terrain. Precipitation may change back to a very brief period of snow and sleet before winding down early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
